title: Data Dictionary
text:
Data table
Description




project
Project specific data, including dates, home port, vessel information, equipment used and equipment specifications


operations
Shipboard operations of survey equipment, including dates and times of HRG survey equipment ramp up, testing, and full power


effort
PSO monitoring effort, including dates, times, and lat/long of monitoring, type of monitoring (visual or acoustic), and weather and conditions during monitoring


visualdetect
Summarizes visual detections of protected species, including species name, count of individuals, behavior of animals, and distance to boat and equipment


acousticdetect
Summarizes acoustic detections of protected species, including species name, count of individuals, behavior of animals, and distance to boat and equipment


portcall
Describes vessel port calls and includes dates, times, and port name


PSOs
Names and affiliations of protected species observers (PSOs) assigned to project

acousticdetect

PSOs

title: Offshore Wind Development Protected Species Observer (PSO) Data
text: Prior to offshore wind farm construction, developers conduct High Resolution Geophysical (HRG) surveys in the lease area to better characterize the seafloor. Protected species monitoring is required during survey operations in accordance with Bureau of Ocean Energy Management (BOEM) and National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS) regulations. Protected Species Observer (PSO) data from developer HRG survey operations are summarized here and organized by year and developer/project.

title: Offshore Wind Development Protected Species Observer (PSO) Data
text: Prior to offshore wind farm construction, developers conduct High Resolution Geophysical (HRG) surveys in the lease area to better characterize the seafloor. Protected species monitoring is required during survey operations in accordance with Bureau of Ocean Energy Management (BOEM) and National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS) regulations. Protected Species Observer (PSO) data from developer HRG survey operations are summarized here and organized by year and developer/project.
